short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will save your unsent notes locally in FurAffinity. This way, you will be able to complete your messages and sendâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will save your unsent notes locally in FurAffinity. This way, you will be able to complete your messages and send them at a later date. This also prevents you from losing your message in case you go to another page or refresh accidentally.
